source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_00<tab>Papalymo has a notion of how you might endear yourself to the sylphs of Little Solace.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_00<tab>パパリモはシルフ族に冒険者を認めさせたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_01 This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Papalymo in Little Solace.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_01本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、シルフの仮宿の「パパリモ」から再受注してください。

※次のメインクエストは、「メインクエストガイド」からも確認することができます。メインクエストガイドの表示/非表示は、メインコマンドの「キャラクターコンフィグ」から「ユーザーインターフェース設定」を選び、変更してください。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_02<tab>As Imedia would tell it, the sylphs live in constant fear of attacks by ill-tempered forest creatures. She bids you slay five ziz gorlins and five gall gnats, that the residents of Little Solace might rest easy, and suggests that procuring five brownie brushes in the process would also go far to curry the sylphs' favor.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_02<tab>不便な生活をしているシルフ族のために、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F0DF01 /var>」と「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2086D01 /var>」を5体倒そう。また、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86C101 /var>」も5つ必要だ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_03<tab>You have dispatched the invasive fauna, and obtained brownie brushes for the sylphs. Report to Komuxio of Little Solace and impress upon him your good intentions.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_03<tab>魔物を倒し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86C101 /var>を入手した。シルフの仮宿の「コムシオ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_04<tab>Komuxio expresses gratitude for your efforts on behalf of Little Solace. It would seem the sylphs have begun to warm to your presence, albeit gradually.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_SEQ_04<tab>魔物を討伐し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86C101 /var>を渡すとコムシオはとても喜んでいた。冒険者は少しだけ認められたようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Papalymo in Little Solace.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_TODO_00本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
シルフの仮宿のパパリモから再受注してください

TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_TODO_04本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
シルフの仮宿のパパリモから再受注してください

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As an adventurer, you're no stranger to helping distressed folk, I'd wager.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_000)) (( )) 03 /var>、君は冒険者だ。
これまで困ってる人たちの依頼を解決してきた。
依頼主は喜んでいたはずだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_001<tab>Tales of good deeds are quick to spread. The adventurer who comes to the aid of the local populace can go from stranger to hero o'ernight.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_001シルフ族も僕たちに言えないだけで、
同じように困っていることがあると思うんだよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_002<tab>No doubt you see what I'm getting at. The sylphs who make their home in Little Solace do so having been driven from their woodland home. Surely, they have their fair share of troubles.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_002特に、ここのシルフ族は、北東の「シルフ領」を追われ、
この地を仮の宿としていて、
さまざまな不便を強いられているらしい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_003<tab>Seek out troubled sylphs, and see what might be done to ease their worries. A sound plan, would you not say?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_003それを解決すれば、少しは信用を得ることが
できるんじゃないかな？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_004<tab>That said, the sylphs are not known to share their worries with outsiders. You would be better off inquiring with Hearer Imedia; of the Gridanians who reside here, she is most like to be privy to the sylphs' troubles.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_PAPALYMO_000_004グリダニアから来ているイメディアが、
シルフ族から、何やら相談を受けているようなんだ。
彼女に詳しい話を聞いてみてくれるかい？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_010<tab>Ah, you've returned. Praise be to the elementals─I cannot express how happy I am to see an adventurer with a truly gentle heart. The sylphs of Little Solace are sorely in need of aid. Pray hear me out.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_010あら、冒険者さん。
私に何か御用でしょうか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_011<tab>Being a temporary settlement, Little Solace wants for amenities, not least a stout set of defenses. Consequently, beasts from malms around are free to wander in and terrorize the hapless residents.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_011……まぁ、シルフ族が困っていることを
解決してきてくださるの？
それはうれしいお言葉です。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_012<tab>If you could put down the ziz gorlins and gall gnats that roam these parts─five of each should suffice─the sylphs and I would be eternally grateful.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_012この地の周辺には、シルフ族に害をなす魔物がいるのです。
そうですね……「」と「」を、
それぞれ5匹ずつ退治していただけますか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_013<tab>Furthermore, perhaps you could gather five brownie brushes as well. They play an important role in sylphic culture─I do not claim to know the details─and what with such feral beasts prowling the forests, they are not easily come by.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_013もうひとつ、「」を5つほど、
採ってきていただきたいのです。
あれは、シルフ族が生活するうえで必要なものなのです。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_014<tab>When you are done with the deeds, seek out Komuxio. He is slow to warm to outsiders, but your good intentions will not be lost on him. My own experience speaks to this.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_IMEDIA_000_014すべて終わりましたら「コムシオ」に伝えてください。
きっと喜ぶと思います。
では、よろしくお願いいたしますね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_KOMUXIO_000_030<tab>Dancing one is still here? Dancing one can dance all <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((night)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) /var>─this one's trust is not so easily earned.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_KOMUXIO_000_030ままま、まだ居たのでふっち？
いくらみんなに挨拶ちても、わたぴは信用しないでふっち。
……ふえ？　またも、わたぴに届け物なのでふっち？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_KOMUXIO_000_031<tab>Hm? Dancing one brings brownie brushes for this one? This one can dye thread once more. This one is pleased.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_KOMUXIO_000_031これはこれは、ご丁寧にでふっち。
……「」でふっち！？
これで染め物が楽しめるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_KOMUXIO_000_032<tab>Dancing one kills bitey, buzzy ones? This one hates, hates, hates bitey, buzzy ones! Dancing one is kind... Too kind.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_KOMUXIO_000_032ええ？　わたぴらをいぢめる魔物も、
やっつけてくれたのでふっち！？
……なんと心優ちき「ヒト」なのでふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_KOMUXIO_000_033<tab>Many walking ones come to these ones' abode, but few are friendly like dancing one. Perhaps this one was wrong not to trust dancing one, after all.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA104_00718_KOMUXIO_000_033……アナタたぴのことが、
ようやく、わかってきた気がするでふっち。
